argTypes.modelValue: Selected value in radio button group
argTypes.disabled: Disables all radio buttons in group, making them unavailable for interaction
argTypes.invalid: Marks radio button group as invalid
argTypes.size: Size of all radio buttons in group: sm (small), normal (default), lg (large)
argTypes.variant: Style variant of all radio buttons in group: outlined (with border) or filled (filled)
argTypes.name: Name attribute for all radio buttons in group
argTypes.default: Slot for placing child CRadio components
argTypes.change: Event fired when selected option in group changes
